long_description: Sturdy and waterproof, the Marmot Motion shell pants keep you comfortable, dry and protected from the elements. Marmot MemBrain(R) nylon laminate shell is waterproof and breathable; 2-layer laminate construction is fully seam taped. Polyester mesh lining works to transport moisture away from body. Articulated knees offer a comfortable fit and freedom of movement. Zippered handwarmer pockets carry a few essentials. Side cargo pocket stores a few bulky items. Twin snap waist with zipper fly has dual side adjusters for a personalized fit. Marmot Motion shell pants include Internal gaiters with elastic grippers to seal snow from entering boots.
